entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 33. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries this morning. Wind becoming north 20 km/h this morning. High minus 33. Wind chill near minus 50. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Monday 13 February 2023
